translations.translation: All things small or great have been written down.
everything large or small, is duly inscribed.
Every small or great deed is written down.
And every small and great thing is recorded.
And everything, small and large, is written down.
And everything small and great is written down.
and everything, great and small, is inscribed.
And every small and great thing is recorded.
every action, small or great, is noted down.
And everything, small and great, hath been written down.
and everything big and small is committed to writing.
Every matter, small and great, is on record.
And everything, small and big is written (in Al-Lauh Al-Mahfuz already beforehand i.e. before it befalls, or is done by its doer) (See the Quran V. 57:22).
everything, be it great or small, is recorded.
Everything, small or large, is written down.
And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.
[54:53] and every small and great, sin, or deed, is inscribed, is recorded in the Preserved Tablet (al-lawh al-mahfūz).

(And every small and great thing) of good or evil (is recorded) in the Guarded Tablet; this was revealed about the people who disputed about fate and who denied that everything is recorded in the Guarded Tablet.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } كيف لا يحفظ؛ إذ { كُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ } وقليل وكثير على التفصيل { مُّسْتَطَرٌ } [القمر: 53] مسطور على التفصيل في اللوح المحفوظ أولاً، وفي صحائف أعمالهم ثانياً، وبالجملة: لا يعزب عن حيطة علمه شيء من أعمالهم وأقوالهم، وأطوارهم وأحوالهم مطلقاً
